title: Ruby's Closing Monologue | American Horror Stories - Episode 2: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part Two" (HD)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Fun fact, I've actually met Kaia Gerber's grandma. It's been a very long time but it's really fucking cool to know.

doesnt it feel like that peele twlight tho?

the mind reading one
Nice ending Scarlett and ruby forever.
Can you post the scene where Scarlett tries to prank her dads but ends up cutting one of them?
description:
Ruby (Kaia Gerber) talks about the struggles of being dead.
